rukus.text: Nuh said, “My Fosterer, they disobeyed me, and followed him whose wealth and children added to him nothing but loss
And they planned a great plan
And they said: Do not leave your gods, nor leave Wadd, nor Suwa nor Yagus and Yauq and Nasr* *Names of false gods (deities)
And they have misled many, and You do not (give) increase to the unjust persons in anything but error.”
They were drowned because of their faults, then made to enter the fire, and they did not find for themselves any helpers besides Allah
And Nuh said, “My Fosterer! do not leave on the earth any dweller from among the infidels
for if you leave them they will mislead your servants and they will not give birth to any but transgressing, ungrateful (children)

My Fosterer ! protectively forgive me and my parents and him who enters my house as a believer, and the believing men and the believing women and do not (give) increase to the unjust persons, in anything but ruin.”
